All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Controller
Controller class allows to generate and send prank emails
EmailMessage
EmailMessage class allows to forge an email message with the given parameters
FileReader
ConfigReader class allows to read a file line by line
Group
Group class allows to create a group of email addresses and a forged email message with a chosen prank message
Main
Main class of the prankmail application.
ManPage
ManPage class provides methods to handle and display information related to the Prankmail application
Message
Message class allows to store the subject and the content of an email message
SMTPClient
SMTPClient class allows to send forged email messages to the SMTP server
